panels.title: Process Monitoring

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device
panels.title: Disk IOps Completed

targets.legendFormat: TCPForwardRetrans - Packets losts retransmitted with Forward RTO-Recovery
TCPSlowStartRetrans - Packets losts retransmitted after a slow start
TCPSynRetrans - SYN-SYN/ACK retransmits to break down retransmissions in SYN, fast/timeout retransmits
TCPSpuriousRTOs - FRTO's successfully detected spurious RTOs
TCPSpuriousRtxHostQueues - Times detected that the fast clone is not yet freed in tcp_transmit_skb()
TCPFullUndo - Retransmits that undid the CWND reduction
TCPPartialUndo - Congestion windows partially recovered using Hoe heuristic

panels.description:
200: Ok success
304:  redirection
400: Bad Request response status
503: Service Unavailable server error response
panels.title: Request Per Second (Prometheus)
